H0.text: Rialto, Scalzi and Constitution are all bridges in which European city. Rome

H1.text: Rialto, Scalzi and Constitution are all bridges in which European city. Florence

H2.text: Rialto, Scalzi and Constitution are all bridges in which European city. Milan

H3.text: Rialto, Scalzi and Constitution are all bridges in which European city. Venice

A4.text: The Ponte della Costituzione, the fourth bridge across the Grand Canal, which connects the Piazzale Roma bus-terminal area with the Venezia Santa Lucia railway station.
